message: Starting independent review of Schema & Core Implementation phase deliverables

Examining implementation details - found enhanced state_db.py with new tables and lifecycle management

Review complete. APPROVED: Phase successfully delivered enhanced state_db with lifecycle management, dashboard integration, and proper task status transitions. Foundation is solid for next phases.
